title: ID REQ: Calligraphic / scripty / wedding-y type face at Vinatge & Rare Guitars
content:
Hi all,

I have an absolute glut of these on my system, and can’t quite nail the correct one - any ideas?

[Vintage & Rare Guitars](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101848/http:/www.vintageandrareguitars.com/)

Cheers all,

s
author: nert

comments.content:
Aha! Thank you, you’re an absolute star! :)

Don’t suppose you know this by any change [anyone else feel free! ;)]

The lowercase b is a variant of Chalet, it’s the rest, particularly the e and the c I can’t place together in one face. Some glyphs look like Interstate, some not.

s

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101848im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bmi_4388.jpg)

It’s a law: New requests in new threads! You hijacked your own request.

BTW: No idea. Doesn’t look like a »real« font to me.
